rooms.Name: A Parking Lot
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a parking lot. You are amazed by what you see. You see a big
blue portal. From it appears a naked man. This is very weird.

rooms.Name: On a Road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a narrow road. To the north you can see a bar. It looks
like a dump. You here a lot of strange and loud noises coming from there. You
wouldn't want to ever go there.

rooms.Name: On a Road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a narrow road. A bar is to the east. It looks like a dump.
You here a lot of noises and weird sounds coming from in there. You don't feel
the need to go there. You feel like going to a place without cockroaches.

rooms.Name: A Big Blue Portal
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by blue light. It is bright. You can see through the other
side. You see destruction and chaos on the other side. It looks to you like 
you are in a time warp.

rooms.Name: A Destoryed Parking Lot
rooms.Description:
You see the parking lot that you saw on the other side. But everythig here is
destroyed. The blue portal is still here. Everything looks horrible. As a man
runs by you ask him the date. He gives you an intresting answer. You find
yourself to be in the future. You don't like the looks of it.

rooms.Name: A Trashed and Destroyed Area
rooms.Description:
You see tons of robots here. You feel frightened. They are causing chaos. The
area is toatally destroyed be these robots. You do not like the future at all.

rooms.Name: A Trashed and Destroyed Area
rooms.Description:
You see a virtual army of robots here and they are destroyig everything in
everything in sight.  The fear is creeping up into your heart. There is 
such chaos that you almost miss the small door set into the floor.

rooms.Name: A Bar
rooms.Description:
You see pool tables here. But nobody is playing pool. Everyone is staring at the
back. There are some people back there in the kitchen. It sounds like they are
fighting. You can here once man screaming loudly. This is making you frightened.
You aren't sure if you want to stay.

rooms.Name: A Kitchen
rooms.Description:
You see a man who looks like he was burnt on the stove. He was stripped naked by
another man here. The other man looks mechanical. He is wearing the naked mans
clothes. The naked my is screaming very loud.

rooms.Name: Farther Down the Road
rooms.Description: You are walking further down the narrow road. You see a bar to the south and a police officer to the north. He looks lost. He has no police car or bike. Maybe he is going to check stuff out at the bar.

rooms.Name: Along the Road
rooms.Description: You see a police officer here. He asks you 'Have you seen this boy?' and shows you a picture of a young boy. You answer no and he walks away. To the south you can still see that disgusting bar.

rooms.Name: Further Down The Road
rooms.Description:
You are walkng further down the narrow road. It looks like it runs a lot 
farther to the north. To the south you see a police officer. Further south
you see that disgusting old bar. Far ahead to the north you see another 
building.

rooms.Name: Further Down The Road
rooms.Description:
You are walkng further down the narrow road. It looks like it runs a lot 
farther to the north. To the south you see a police officer. Further south
you see that disgusting old bar. Far ahead to the north you see another 
building.

rooms.Name: Further Down The Road
rooms.Description:
You are walkng further down the narrow road. It looks like it runs a lot 
farther to the north. To the south you see a police officer. Further south
you see that disgusting old bar. Far ahead to the north you see another 
building.

rooms.Name: Still On The Road
rooms.Description:
The building looks a lot closer now, but you still can't make out what it is.
To the south you can hardly see the police officer or the bar anymore. You
think 'How long could this road be?'. But then you look to the north and look
back to the south, it's not as big as you thought. Then a car drives by and mud
splashes all over you. Doh!!!

rooms.Name: On a Road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a narrow road. To the north you can see a bar. It looks
like a dump. You here a lot of strange and loud noises coming from there. You
wouldn't want to ever go there.

rooms.Name: On a Road
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a narrow road. To the far north you can see a br. It
looks like a dump. You hear a lot of strange and loud noises coming from ther.
You wouldn't want to ever go there.

rooms.Name: Far Down The Road
rooms.Description:
You are pretty far down the road. To the east you see a tall building. To the
south you can no longer see the bar or the police officer. Farther up the road
to the north you see another building. You here lots of music down there,
you think to yourself 'What can be going on down there?!?!?'.

rooms.Name: In Front of a Tall Building
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of a tall building. There is a sign right here. It
says 'Cyberdine Systems'. You figure that must be the name of the company.
By looking at the building and by the name of the place you figure it is a
research lab.

rooms.Name: Inside the Entrance to Cyberdine
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the entrance area of Cyberdine Systems.  They have a
terrific security system here that requires the use of a key card to enter
most doors and areas in this building.  IF you want to get in you will have 
to find one.   But HOW??????

Exits.Description:
There is a Huge security door here and it is metal with a large box that has
small slot in it for the security badges.

rooms.Name: A Hallway In Cyberdine
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a hallway at Cyberdine Systems. There is an elevator right
here. The hallway ends here so it looks like the elevator is the only place to
go.

rooms.Name: An Elevator
rooms.Description:
You are standing inside of an elevator. Geez, this elevator music is horrible!
Why do people make this junky music? You want to get out of this elevator as
soon as possible.

rooms.Name: The Upper Floor of Cyberdine Systems
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a dark hallway. To the west is an elevator. To the south
is the Cyberdine Lab area.

rooms.Name: An Elevator
rooms.Description:
You are standing inside of an elevator. Geez, this elevator music is horrible!
Why do people make this junky music? You want to get out of this elevator as
soon as possible.

rooms.Name: Cyberdine Lab Area
rooms.Description:
You are in a room full of computers and all kinds of high tech stuff you 
have no idea how to use.  Maybe you should just move on before you are
detected in this room.

rooms.Name: On a Road.
rooms.Description:
You are on what seems to be a long road.  There are alot of cars parked 
here and there and the people seem to have just disappeared.  There are
Business along the side of the road and to the north you can make out a
hospital.  You wonder if you might find some people there.

rooms.Name: On a Road.
rooms.Description:
You are on what seems to be a long road.  There are alot of cars parked 
here and there and the people seem to have just disappeared.  There are
Business along the side of the road and to the north you can make out a
hospital.  You wonder if you might find some people there.

rooms.Name: On a Road.
rooms.Description:
You are on what seems to be a long road.  There are alot of cars parked 
here and there and the people seem to have just disappeared.  There are
Business along the side of the road and to the north you can make out a
hospital.  You wonder if you might find some people there.

rooms.Name: Entrance to a factory.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an entrance to a large factory.  There is a small
reception desk here.  There is a door to the east that leads to the 
factory floor.  BE sure to wear your hard hat it is dangerous in there.

rooms.Name: Before A Large Metal Door
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of a huge metal door. There has to be something VERY
expensive to have a door like this. It looks like a rocket longer couldn't even
blow it down. Well... you might be overdoing it a little. But not that much.

rooms.Name: In a dark safe.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a dark safe.  The only light is a deep blue light that 
is eminating from a large glass display case placed in the middle of the 
room.  The walls are made of a slick looking metallic material. There
appear to be no exits.  Just how DO you plan to get out???

rooms.Name: On a road.
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a city street.  There are cars whizzinf past you and
hundreds of people walking past you on their way to their lives. To the east
is a small cheap motel.

rooms.Name: On a road.
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a city street.  There are cars whizzing past you
and people walking past you on their way to their lives.  To the east
you can just barely make out a small motel.

rooms.Name: In the bathroom.
rooms.Description:
You are in a tiny bathroom in a cheap motel.  Although everything
is clean it appears to be several years old and in need of some repair. There
are some small bottles of shampoo sitting here that look as though they
have been here longer than the motel itself.

rooms.Name: Entrance to underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in fron of the entrance to a large underground bunker. There
is a door leading up that will take you back to the destroyed remains of
the city.  This place seems safe but it is dirty and looks pretty 
depressing.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are in an underground bunker.  There are people running around that 
look as if they have been to hell and lived to tell the tale. There
is a stench here that is burning your nostrils.  The smoke rising off
of the many small fires here burning your eyes , making the water.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker.  The Rooms are small and 
not ventilated very well.   The people seem to be crammed in here 
like sardines.  The walls are a grey color probably due to the soot
that has built up from the many fires that burn here and there.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker. Everything down here looks 
grey.  The walls, the ceiling, and the people all have a grey almost
unnatural cast to them.  The fires burning for heat and cooking sources
cast eerie shadows over that which is already freightening.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You ar e standing in an underground bunker.  There are too many
people in here for this small and area.  The act like scared rats
hiding in a hole in the ground, going out only in the cloak of dark-
ness.  There is little or ne space for these people to live
but yet they do.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are in the underground bunker of the rebels. The rats are numerous and
are scurring everywhere under the unhabitants of this small, dirty bunker.
The people here look like they are barely hanging on by a tiny string.
The destruction in the bunker makes you wonder if the outside world could
really be as bad as all this then remember you came throught the destruction
outside to get into this bunker.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker.  There is almost no 
light here except for that which comes from the fires burning everywhere.
The rats scurry under your feet and even they look scrawny.  The people
here look as if the last decent meal they had and last bath had to be at
least a month ago.

rooms.Name: The clerk's office at a small motel.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a small motel's clerk's office.  There is a 
tall counter here with a person standing behind it.  The walls
are of a wooden paneling and with the deer head on the wall, it 
almost looks like a hunting lodge.

rooms.Name: On the sidewalk.
rooms.Description:
You are walking on a sidewalk outside the rooms outside of a cheap motel.
If you go north from here you will be in room #1 and back to the South-
east is the clerk's office.

rooms.Name: On the sidewalk.
rooms.Description:
You are on a sidewalk outside of the rooms of a cheap motel.  The rooms all
branch off from this sidewalk to the north.  Directly to the north of 
here is Room #2

rooms.Name: On the sidewalk.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a sidewalk outside of a cheap motel.  The roms 
all lie north of this sidewalk. There are numbers on all of the doors
to denote which room is which.

rooms.Name: On a sidewalk.
rooms.Description:
You are on a sidewalk outside of a cheap motel.  The rooms lie directly
noeth of this sidewalk.  To the north is Room #4.

rooms.Name: On a sidewalk.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a sidewalk outside of a cheap motel.  The rooms
in this hotel all lie directly north of this sidewalk.  There are 
numbers on each door denoting which room it is.

rooms.Name: On a sidewalk.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a sidewalk in front of the rooms of this cheap 
motel.  The rooms all lie north of this sidewalk.  There are signs on
all the doors that let you know what room you are going into.

rooms.Name: In room #6 at a cheap motel.
rooms.Description:
This is a small room in a cheap motel.  There is a double size bed in 
the middle of the room and a small chair sits by the window, next to a 
small table.  There is a wooden dresser here with several drawers in
it and a bible sitting on top of it.

rooms.Name: In room #5 in a cheap motel.
rooms.Description:
You are in Room #5 of a cheap motel.  The bed linens look old and in
need of some mending .  Although this room shows it's age in decor and
state of disrepair it is clean, much to your suprise. There is a dresser
along one wall and on that dresser isa bible.

rooms.Name: In room #4 of a cheap motel.
rooms.Description:
This is a room in a cheap motel.  The bed is a double size bed but it 
looks like Washington slept here cause it is so broken down. There is
a bible on the dresser, are you sure you wouldn't like to pray before
you sleep in that broken down bed.

rooms.Name: In room #3 of a cheap motel.
rooms.Description:
This is a small room in a cheap motel.  The only furnishings are a 
bed and a dresser.  There is a door leading to the bathroom to the 
north. To get back to the sidewalk go back south.

rooms.Name: In room #2 of a cheap motel.
rooms.Description:
You are in a small room in a cheap motel.  The room is sparsely furnished
with only a bed and a small dresser.  To the north is a bathroom and to 
the south is back out on the sidewalk.

rooms.Name: In Room #1 in a cheap motel.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a small room in a cheap motel.  The bed coverings
look like they are older than you  The room, although cheap, is very 
clean.  There is a batroom to the north.

rooms.Name: The bathroom of room #1.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the bathroom.  All the fixtures are white and 
the bath tub looks old, it has big claw feet that sit on a white tiled
floor.

rooms.Name: In the bathroom.
rooms.Description:
You are in a tiny bathroom in a cheap motel.  The bathroom is in a 
state of disrepair.  The sink and tub are chippes and discolored.  The
towels, once a pristine white, are now a dingy yellow color.

rooms.Name: In the bathroom.
rooms.Description:
You are in a tiny bathroom in a cheap motel. The tub
and sink are chipped and discolored.  The towels, Once white, are now yellow
and dingy with age.

rooms.Name: In the bathroom.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a tiny bathroom of a cheap motel room.  The bathroom
fixtures all look as though the need some repair.  The towels, although
clean, look as though some new ones need to be purchased. There is a
sign here that says this room was specially sanitized for you.  Are
you wiling totake their word for it?

rooms.Name: In the bathroom.
rooms.Description:
You are in a tiny bathroom just off of a room in a cheap motel. This 
bathroon looks like it was built in the middle ages.  Most of the 
fixtures are in a state of disrepair. If I were you I would get out 
before something overflows or explodes.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker that is filled with people and rats.
There are weapons in every adults hands as if they expect to be invaded 
at any moment.  There are eerie shadows on the walls from the fires that 
burn to light this dungeon like place.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker. There are small fires all
around you and small children gather around the fires to stare into 
them and dream of a better life for their children.  There are rats 
running around your feet.  There are some dogs running around here too.
The mix of humans and animals has caused a stench that is breath-taking
. If you stay much longer you will probably be assigned a task better get 
out.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standin in an underground bunker.  The smell in here is 
so bad that you have to hold your hand over your nose just to be able to
breathe.  There are small fires here and there.  The smoke from the fires
is burning your eyes and nose.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are in a underground bunker.  From the looks of things down here, 
you wonder if there is actually anything left above ground.  There are
small fires burning here and there.  There are women cooking on the small
fires and some small children stare into them blankly.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are in an underground bunker.  The walls are very close here.  
there is a stench here that comes from humans and animals living in 
such close quarters.  There are small fires burning around that 
are used for cooking and light.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker.  There is a stench in here that
is breath-taking.  The smell of smoke is everywhere and it makes your eyes
water.  There are small children here that are staring blankly into the 
fires that burn here for light and cooking.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are in an undergroun bunker.  There are small children sitting around
and not doing anything.  They seem almost like dolls lost in this hell on 
earth.  The walls have an eerie cast from the fires that burn and you can
see that they are covered in a thick coating of soot.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
This is the underground headquarters for the rebels. They are 
fighting against the machines of the new world order.  The children here 
look as though they have been through more than most adults.  They 
look war-ready and as if the have lost their childish wonder.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are in an underground bunker.  The ceilings are low and covered 
with black soot.  There are rats running all over the place.  The 
children here chase the rats as a game it seem that is all the 
entertainment they have.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing deep underground in a bunker.  There is a stench that 
has the unmistakable odor that results from animals and humans living in
such close quarters.  There are dogs sleeping all around you.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker.  The walls seem to close 
in around you the furthur you go.  There are small fires burning in each
section and they cast eerie shadows around you.  There is the smell of 
fire all around you.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are in an underground bunker.  There is very little light except
for the fires that burn here and there.  The soot from the fires covers 
the wall with a black film.  The people you see here look as though they
have been beaten down before but wil not let it happen again.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker.  This bunker is the result
of the new machine age.  Those with the machines run the world and those 
who have no machines hide in underground bunkers fighting for life and
limb.

rooms.Name: In an underground bunker.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an underground bunker.  There is very little light here
with the exception of the fires that cast eerie shadows on the soot-covered
walls.  The weary faces of children stare blankly at you as if asking
"what next ?"

rooms.Name: Men's bathroom.
rooms.Description:
You are in the men's bathroom.  There are several urinals here.  
On one wall is alarge mirror in which the more vain men might 
spruce up their hair.  To the west you go back into the club

rooms.Name: Women's bathroom.
rooms.Description:
You are in the women's bathroom.  There are several stalls here but all
seem to be occupied. There are some women here looking in the mirror 
reapplying their lipstick.  The smell in here is a mixture of bathroom
cleaner and women's perfume.

rooms.Name: On the dance floor.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the dance floor of a hot new club.  There are 
lights flashing all around you and there are people all around you.
By the way.... WHY AREN'T YOU DANCING!  The people around you are 
dancing with wild abandon.  There is the scent of a womans cologne
mixed with the aftershave of man and the scent of fresh perspiration.
Do you think you can keep up with this dance.

rooms.Name: On the dance floor.
rooms.Description:
You are on the dance floor.  There are people all around you 
dancing to the latest tune.  There is a thick cloud of smoke all
around you and you can barely see through it. There are all sorts
of flashing lights above you that change with the thump of the music

rooms.Name: On the dance floor.
rooms.Description:
You are on a dance floor with several club goers.  The people here
seem to have had too much to drink,  they look like they can barely
stand, much less dance.

rooms.Name: On the dance floor.
rooms.Description:
You re standing on a huge dance floor. There are people everywhere
and they are all dancing.  The sound of the music is so loud you 
can barely hear yourself think.   The smell of smoke is so strong that 
it burns your nose and eyes.

rooms.Name: On the stage.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the dance floor of the hottest new night club in town.
There are people all around you dancing and smiling.  There is a smoke
machine at the edge of the dance floor going full blast and it is making
it so smoky you can barely see 2 feet in front of yourself.

rooms.Name: On the dance floor.
rooms.Description:
This is the dance floor in the hottest new club in town.  The squares
of wood look as though an army has danced through here.. and with this
crowd anything is possible.  There are men and women here in all phases
of dance some bump and grind while others just dance like they have
been friends for years.  The thick smoke makes it hard to see past
the flashing lights and beautiful people.

rooms.Name: At the bar.
rooms.Description:
You are standing at a bar.  It is a long wooden bar with many scuffs 
in the finish.  Looks like a few boiler-makers have been spilled here
and left to burn.  There are several empty glass sitting here where
patrons have drained them and left them to be cleaned. There are
astrays here overflowing with the remains of cigerettes.  The
smell of alcohol and smoke is overwhelming.

rooms.Name: At the bar.
rooms.Description:
You are standing at a long scuffed bar.  It look like many a drink have
been created...and drunk here.  There are marks in the wood from mislaid
cigerettes and from the sliding of drinks up and down the bar.  There are
several people here waiting to get there next drink.  You wonder if most
of the people waiting actually need another drink.

rooms.Name: At a table in the night club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing at a much to crowded table at a night club.  The music
is so loud you ca barely hear your self think, much less talk to those 
with you. The smoke is so thick you can only see a few feet in front 
of you.  The smoke is burning your eyes and making them water.

rooms.Name: At a table in the night club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing at a crowded table in a night club.  There are 
a lot of drunk people sitting here playing some odd drinking game.
There are several shot glasses stacked in the center of the table
that resemble a pyramid.

rooms.Name: A dark corner in the night club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a dark corner of the night club.  You can barely 
make out several couples making out. There is almost no light here
due to the position of the stage.  This is where people come 
to be alone in a crowded place but this is the most crowded spot
in the whole place.

rooms.Name: On the Stage.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the stage of a night club.  There are some angry
band members here that are wondering why you are stealing their spot
light.  From this vantage point you should be able to see the whole
bar but sure to the spot light and the lights flashing in time to the 
music there is such a glare you can't see past the end of the stage.

rooms.Name: On the stage.
rooms.Description:
You are on the satge of the hottest night club in town.  There is a 
band here that is not happy that you are stealing their lime light.  The
light here is so hot that beads of perspiration are running down your
neck.  There is so much smoke up here that you are choking on it.

rooms.Name: On the stage.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the stage of the hottest nght club in town.  There
are people on that stage that appear to be a band.  There are several
musical instruments  and amplifiers sitting here waiting for the band
to finish their break.

rooms.Name: The D.J. booth.
rooms.Description:
You are in the D.J. booth.  You better not let him catch you messing
with his records or he will have a fit.  There are several thousand 
records here with which he entertains people.  The turntable is 
spinning now with the latest tune and the D.J. is out on the dance 
floor flirting with the ladies.

rooms.Name: At a table in the club.
rooms.Description:
You are at a small over-crowded table in the night club.  There are 
several drunk people here.. getting drunker you assume.  The table 
is covered in glasses and cigerette butts.  The smoke is so thick
here that you can barely see.

rooms.Name: At a table in the club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing by a small table that is crowded with people.  The 
club goers seem to be in a trance,  could it be the music or is it the
liquor? There are several glasses that are sitting on the table, empty.

rooms.Name: A table in the night club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing next to a crowded table in the hottest new night
spot.  There are several drunk people sitting her trying to make a love
connection.. Good Luck.

rooms.Name: At a table in the night club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing by a table in the night club.  There are several 
club goers here inebriated.  The table is a small round wooden one 
that is meant for 4 people but had at least double that amount 
sitting around it in any given night.

rooms.Name: At a table in the club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing by a small, wooden. over-crowded table in the hottest
new night club in town.  There are twice as many people huddled 
around this table as it was meant to have.  There is a stack of 
empty shot glasses in the center of the table and the ashtray
is over-flowing.

rooms.Name: At a table in the night club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing at a small, over-crowded, wooden table. The
people here are all drinking and seem to be too drunk to know
your there much less to drive. You wonder if they have a 
designated driver.

rooms.Name: In the Night club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the hottest night club in town.  There will be
hundreds of single men and women here seeking each other out.  There 
are several mulit colored lights that flash and move with the thump
of the latest music.  There are people huddles at all the tables 
talking and drinking.

rooms.Name: Entrance to the night club.
rooms.Description:
You finally made it to the entance of this hot night spot.  There is 
a woman here to take your money.  The woman is standing inside a cage. 
By the looks of her you think that may be for the patrons protectios as
much as her own.  There walls are painted all sorts of brilliant colors
of day glo paint.  There is a bouncer here who looks like a mack truck
, It is probably best you don't mess with him.

rooms.Name: Standing in line to get into the club.
rooms.Description:
You are closer to the front of the line but there are still several
people ahead of you.......Wonder if you could bribe people for their 
place in line?  There are some signs here advertising the bands that
play here on a regular basis.  As you move forward you notice that 
the line continues to grow behind you.  This place must be packed
inside if there are this many people out here.

rooms.Name: Standing in line waiting to get into club.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a very long line to get into the newest hottest
night club in town.  There is a huge sign glowing here with the name
of the club on it.  There are people in front of you and behind you 
waiting to get in as well.  Hope you brought are prepared for a long
wait.
